SOLVAY in brief

- EUR 2,230 million underlying EBITDA in 2017 
- 24,500 employees  
- 124 industrial sites and presence in 61 countries

- Diversified end-markets such as aerospace, automotive, construction, consumer goods, energy, water and environment and electronics
